title: How to get LOADING SCREEN BORDER?
body:
Hello, i have finally reached my goal for this season and became a plat.
To get a plat border do i have to play at plat league number of games or it's enough to finish plat by the end of the season?
Thank you for any help!

replies.body:
First of all, congrats on getting to Platinum! ^.^

We haven't announced ranked rewards for the season yet, but when we do, you'll get more specifics on what rewards are going out this year post-season. At the very least, staying in plat or climbing up higher in the divisions and ranking is a good move at the moment.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Any specific date on the end of the season? Something like November?

No specific date yet, but if history repeats itself, it shouldn't be terribly long after worlds is over. Keep an eye on the [News page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for the official announcement.
so i understand, if i stop playing ranked until the end of the season i will get the plat border for sure.

Probably not. Once you are in plat, not playing any ranked games for 28 days will result in your account being placed on "ranked inactivity" which means that you can lose LP due to decay, and even being demoted back to Gold I as a result.

Now, I don't know how it will be this season, but I'm pretty sure it will be like last season, where you got rewards based on your ranking at the end of the season, not your peak ranking. This means that if you don't play ranked until the end of the season, and you get demoted back to Gold I, you will not get the plat border. So make sure you play at least 1 match every 28 days to make sure you don't decay due to inactivity. It doesn't matter if you lose, as you are much less likely to demote back to gold from losing than due to inactivity.

To get the boarder, you need to finish in plat at the end of the season. Then when Riot distributes the ranked rewards, you will get the boarder along with all the other ranked rewards you qualified for.
